text: I find the certification highly useful
in terms of getting you into the space
you want to be in a very short period of
time
certification gives you the proof that
you need to showcase that you have the
skills required for specific market it's
a goal that you can pursue so you're not
just learning for the fun of what I want
to learn everything it's allowed us to
expand some roles of team members for
example we had a project manager before
who is typically managing IT projects
he's now certified and he's pivoted into
cloud architecture I think that when
people are working with certified
professional they will feel more
confident about the work that we are
doing together a lot of my clients are
cloud native studying for the Solutions
Architect
test gave me a broad view of the
services AWS provides so I can
understand better how they control and
manage data
technology is moving so fast and each
day we have different things happening
continually evolving is is the only way
to stay fresh NIT and then now you can
validate it yes I actually know and I
have retained this knowledge to me it
means that you've taken the time and
you've dedicated that time to furthering
yourself it's it's a really great thing
it's a good feeling
[Music]
